001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties.Property;
005
006/**
007 * Builder to create {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
008 * <table class="table">
009 * <caption><strong>Properties retrieved from LogProperties</strong></caption>
010 * <tr>
011 * <th>Property Pattern</th>
012 * <th>Type</th>
013 * <th>Required</th>
014 * <th>Default</th>
015 * <th>Description</th>
016 * </tr>
017 * <tr>
018 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_zoneId }</code></td>
019 * <td><code>String (converted)</code></td>
020 * <td><code>false</code></td>
021 * <td><code>null</code></td>
022 * <td></td>
023 * </tr>
024 * <tr>
025 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_lineSeparator }</code></td>
026 * <td><code>String</code></td>
027 * <td><code>false</code></td>
028 * <td><code>null</code></td>
029 * <td></td>
030 * </tr>
031 * <tr>
032 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_ansiDisabled }</code></td>
033 * <td><code>Boolean</code></td>
034 * <td><code>false</code></td>
035 * <td><code>null</code></td>
036 * <td></td>
037 * </tr>
038 * </table>
039 */
040public final class PatternConfigBuilder {
041
042        /**
043         * The properties to be retrieved from config will have
044         * this prefix.
045         */
046        static final String PROPERTY_PREFIX = "logging.pattern.config.";
047        
048        /**
049         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_zoneId } = java.time.ZoneId</code> 
050         */
051        static final String PROPERTY_zoneId = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "zoneId";
052        /**
053         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_lineSeparator } = java.lang.String</code> 
054         */
055        static final String PROPERTY_lineSeparator = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "lineSeparator";
056        /**
057         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_ansiDisabled } = java.lang.Boolean</code> 
058         */
059        static final String PROPERTY_ansiDisabled = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "ansiDisabled";
060        
061        private final String propertyPrefix;
062        final Property<java.time.ZoneId> property_zoneId;
063        final Property<java.lang.String> property_lineSeparator;
064        final Property<java.lang.Boolean> property_ansiDisabled;
065        
066        private java.time.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable ZoneId zoneId = null;
067        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String lineSeparator = null;
068        private java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled = null;
069        
070        /**
071         * Create a builder for {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
072         */
073        public PatternConfigBuilder(
074                        ) {
075                java.util.Map<String,String> prefixParameters = java.util.Map.of(
076                        );
077                this.propertyPrefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_PREFIX, prefixParameters);
078                property_zoneId = Property.builder()
079                        .map(_v -> io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfigurator.convertZoneId(_v))
080                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_zoneId, prefixParameters));
081
082                property_lineSeparator = Property.builder()
083                                                .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_lineSeparator, prefixParameters));
084
085                property_ansiDisabled = Property.builder()
086                        .toBoolean()
087                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_ansiDisabled, prefixParameters));
088
089        }
090
091
092        
093        /**
094         * Sets zoneId.
095         * 
096         * Default is <code>null</code>.
097         * @param zoneId <code>{@value #PROPERTY_zoneId } = java.time.ZoneId</code> 
098         * @return this builder.
099         */
100        public PatternConfigBuilder zoneId(java.time.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable ZoneId zoneId) {
101                this.zoneId = zoneId;
102                return this;
103        }
104        
105        /**
106         * Sets lineSeparator.
107         * 
108         * Default is <code>null</code>.
109         * @param lineSeparator <code>{@value #PROPERTY_lineSeparator } = java.lang.String</code> 
110         * @return this builder.
111         */
112        public PatternConfigBuilder lineSeparator(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable String lineSeparator) {
113                this.lineSeparator = lineSeparator;
114                return this;
115        }
116        
117        /**
118         * Sets ansiDisabled.
119         * 
120         * Default is <code>null</code>.
121         * @param ansiDisabled <code>{@value #PROPERTY_ansiDisabled } = java.lang.Boolean</code> 
122         * @return this builder.
123         */
124        public PatternConfigBuilder ansiDisabled(java.lang.@org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable Boolean ansiDisabled) {
125                this.ansiDisabled = ansiDisabled;
126                return this;
127        }
128        
129        /**
130         * Creates {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig } from this builder.
131         * @return {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig }.
132         */
133        public io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfig build() {
134                return io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format.PatternConfigurator.provideFormatterConfig(
135                                this.zoneId
136                                , this.lineSeparator
137                                , this.ansiDisabled
138                                );
139        }
140        
141        /**
142         * Fills the builder from properties.
143         * @param properties not null.
144         * @return this updated builder.
145         */
146        public PatternConfigBuilder fromProperties(LogProperties properties) {
147                this.zoneId = property_zoneId.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.zoneId);
148                this.lineSeparator = property_lineSeparator.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.lineSeparator);
149                this.ansiDisabled = property_ansiDisabled.get(properties).valueOrNull(this.ansiDisabled);
150                return this;
151        }
152        
153        /**
154         * Turns the builder into java.util.Properties like Map skipping values that are null.
155         * @param consumer apply is called where first arg is key and second is value.
156         */
157        public void toProperties(java.util.function.BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) {
158                var _zoneId = this.zoneId;
159                if (_zoneId != null) {
160                        consumer.accept(property_zoneId.key(), property_zoneId.propertyString(_zoneId));
161                }
162                var _lineSeparator = this.lineSeparator;
163                if (_lineSeparator != null) {
164                        consumer.accept(property_lineSeparator.key(), property_lineSeparator.propertyString(_lineSeparator));
165                }
166                var _ansiDisabled = this.ansiDisabled;
167                if (_ansiDisabled != null) {
168                        consumer.accept(property_ansiDisabled.key(), property_ansiDisabled.propertyString(_ansiDisabled));
169                }
170        }
171        
172        /**
173         * The interpolated property prefix: {@value #PROPERTY_PREFIX}.
174         * @return resolved prefix which should end with a "<code>.</code>".
175         */
176        public String propertyPrefix() {
177                return this.propertyPrefix;
178        }
179        
180}
